long_description: The Kershaw Cryo II Knife is 20% larger than the original Cryo, with its 3.25-in. SpeedSafe assisted-opening blade. It happily tackles cutting tasks during your outdoor adventures. Built of pure stainless steel and coated with titanium carbo-nitride, the sturdy Kershaw Cryo II Knife sports a clean, no-fuss design. 8Cr13MoV stainless-steel blade with matte gray titanium carbo-nitride coating holds its edge and resists corrosion. Comes with Kershaw's SpeedSafe assisted opening for fast and easy 1-handed opening; access it with either the built-in flipper or the thumbstud. Though it's a larger knife, the Cryo II is remarkably slim and rides comfortably deep in the pocket thanks to the deep-carry clip. Steel liner locks the blade into the open position for secure use. The Kershaw Cryo II Knife includes a reversible pocket clip for tip-up or tip-down carrying.
short_description: The Kershaw Cryo II Knife is 20% larger than the original Cryo, with its 3.25-in. SpeedSafe assisted-opening blade. It happily tackles cutting tasks during your outdoor adventures.
